climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Dishwasher Cleaner Tablets – Thoroughly deep cleans all internal surfaces including stainless dishwasher steel tub and machine plastic parts, including water pump, filter and pipes. Fully compatible with all dishwashers including LG, Whirlpool, Samsung, Bosch, Kitchenaid, Kenmore, Maytag, Frigidaire, GE and others

This Is The Dishwasher Machine Cleaner That Works As Promised – Our advanced active oxygen formula removes all the deeply ingrained grime, gunk, grease, dirt and limescale, and helps to unclog water jets and internal pipework, leaving your machine super fresh. Fully compatible with rinse aid dishwasher cleaner and all dishwasher rinse aid cleaners

Our Heavy-Duty Dishwasher Cleaner and Descaler truly delivers that lovely fresh smell to let you know your machine is super clean and ready to use. You’ll love the fresh smell that greets you whenever you open the machine door

Bad Odor Eliminator and Stain Remover – Our unique dishwasher cleaner and deodorizer pods kill bad odors, removes stains and makes your dish washer cleaner machine sparkle and shine so clean and fresh

Hard Water? No Problem – These tablets are an excellent dishwasher cleaner for hard water. Powerful ingredients quickly dissolve and remove all the scale build up deposited inside your machine by hard water. Problem solved!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works exactly as described, perfect cleaner
reviews.reviewText: Product works exactly as described across multiple models of dishwasher. Very useful and high quantity for the price paid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just used one of these and my dishwasher was so clean after, I was pleasantly surprised! Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is amazing. Cleans great. The inside of the day looks like new.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a very good product which does exactly what it was said it would do. Very clean and smells great. It's much better than any other I have used in the past. So glad I found and ordered this product. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Whoa, it worked, cleaned up bad pink slime
reviews.reviewText: Owned dishwashers my entire life, never had a pink slime problem. Dishwasher started smelling more and more, the filter would get pink fast, the walls were a light pink, and then noticed the water jets were oozing pink junk. Other simple tricks didn't work.Bought this. Instructions said to run 3 rounds on high heat using 2 packets each time. Was skeptical. It did the trick! I did have to clean out any inert pink slime junk still left around different parts, but my dishwasher is back to like when I bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Dishes have never been cleaner!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Worked so so
reviews.reviewText: It did take the hard water stain off inside of door. I can't speak for odors since I've never had any. But this left a white film over my racks . To be clear this was not there prior to use of this product. So I returned the the lemon product from the grocery store, I previously used. This removed the white film off my racks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t work as expected
reviews.reviewText: It did not descale or remove grime. Tried it twice in succession and it still didn’t work as I thought it would.I am upgrading my review as the vendor reached out and made the situation right. Thank you.
